TopicTitle: South-West Launch Site - Kerbal Konstructs Content

Articles.Content: Sweet ! I'm excitedt to play with it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

More screenshots dumps, and kerbal parkour.  

Every space station needs both warehouse and boxes!

You work really rapidly [@Beale](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/70533-beale/) !

So THIS is where this has been all my life! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

I love the stockalike style... not enough KK mods do that. (As in none, other than this one. PLEASE CORRECT ME IF THAT IS WRONG!)

If you ever make one on actual land, I suggest putting the grassy ramp type thing as the actual space center, because it allos for any terrain setting. Also, are the buildings destructable? If it isn't, that's kind of a deal breaker... but They look great anyways!

> 
> 
> On 4/15/2016 at 3:33 PM, Beale said:
> 
> 
> Every space station needs both warehouse and boxes!
> 

Can you make a wooden box part with KIS storage? Then a warehouse. It will be perfect!

EDIT: The non-grass looks awesome! I like it sooo much more!

That's not going to happen.

Why is that a deal-breaker for you?

Can KIS be implemented to static objects? I'm not so familiar with the extra functions of KK, just the basic placement and launchpad parts.

> 
> 
> 14 minutes ago, Beale said:
> 
> 
> Can KIS be implemented to static objects? I'm not so familiar with the extra functions of KK, just the basic placement and launchpad parts.
> 

I'm talking about a part you can place on rockets with the same model/texture.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Beale said:
> 
> 
> That's not going to happen.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Why is that a deal-breaker for you?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Can KIS be implemented to static objects? I'm not so familiar with the extra functions of KK, just the basic placement and launchpad parts.
> 

Because I have certain rules I play by... and buildings have to comply with those rules. Why isn't that going to happen? There's a mod called Rebar that allows you to make them destructable, so you could use that if you ever wanted to.

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, legoclone09 said:
> 
> 
> I'm talking about a part you can place on rockets with the same model/texture.
> 

I see! Maybe.

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, Andem said:
> 
> 
> Because I have certain rules I play by... and buildings have to comply with those rules. Why isn't that going to happen? There's a mod called Rebar that allows you to make them destructable, so you could use that if you ever wanted to.
> 

It would take many hours to produce broken versions of the buildings, I think you would agree time better spent on producing more regular content.

Besides, it looks like Rebar has not been updated since... 2014.
This looks so interesting! Will you add a dirt Runway similar to the tier 1 at the KSC?

> 
> 
> 17 minutes ago, DMSP said:
> 
> 
> This looks so interesting! Will you add a dirt Runway similar to the tier 1 at the KSC?
> 

Possibly. I have a few ideas for aircraft stuff, but they are second place to the rocket facility.
So, how close you are to the first public release? Can't wait to try it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
> 
> 34 minutes ago, KerbOrbiter said:
> 
> 
> So, how close you are to the first public release? Can't wait to try it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

I need to get my other mods 1.1 compatible first, and balance / fix them, etc.

After that, I can return to work on this.

Some more progress.

**[And a W.I.P. version of the launch site, if you would care to try it.](https://www.dropbox.com/s/wmri6rrmrz1x3q0/TantaresLS.7z?dl=0)**

The "mission control" section. The roof will not remain so plain, with some kind of greeble in the works.

**![21772d7c0f.jpg](http://puu.sh/oxL7b/21772d7c0f.jpg)![cb2534054e.jpg](http://puu.sh/oxL6n/cb2534054e.jpg)![4e3f1e8d1a.jpg](http://puu.sh/oxL4I/4e3f1e8d1a.jpg)**
Looks great!

Awesome! I do feel like it needs an airstrip though before I start playing with it. If you can't safely land a plane there I can't use it in my story, not yet.

It looks brilliant though, great work! This is an incredible mod!

A helipad would be a neat addition, but I don't see how you could fit one in without moving some stuff around.

> 
> 
> 57 minutes ago, TheJewelOfJool said:
> 
> 
> A helipad would be a neat addition, but I don't see how you could fit one in without moving some stuff around.
> 

I'm planning quite a significant layout shift for polar launches. Currently you launch over the facility, which seems... Dangerous.

The site needs a few different launch places, helipad, rover garage, etc.

This is some of the best texturing I've ever seen. Great job, Beale ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Is there somewhere that I can download this? I'd love to try it out.
